title: Xiaohongshu Cookie Export
description: Schema for validating exported browser cookies from as.xiaohongshu.com.

url.description: The origin URL from which the cookies were exported (e.g., https://as.xiaohongshu.com).

cookies.description: A list of cookie objects containing session and authentication data.

domain.description: The domain scope of the cookie (e.g., .xiaohongshu.com).

expirationDate.description: The Unix timestamp (in seconds, allowing floating-point precision) indicating when the cookie will expire and be deleted by the browser.

hostOnly.description: Indicates if the cookie is available only to the host specified in the domain attribute.

httpOnly.description: If true, the cookie is inaccessible to the JavaScript Document.cookie API, used to prevent XSS attacks.

name.description: The unique key identifier for the cookie (e.g., 'web_session', 'a1', 'gid').

path.description: The URL path prefix for which the cookie is valid.

sameSite.description: Asserts how the cookie should behave regarding cross-site requests.
